Job Role:

  • First-Party & Third-Party Collections Executive for an International Process

Job Location:

  • Thane West

Job Description:

  •  Actively hiring for First-Party and Third-Party Collections. Candidates with experience in:
  • International Debt Collection / Customer Service / Sales/Retention / Medical Billing / US Collection Processes
  • At least one year of international BPO experience is required
  • Candidates with Good English Communication can apply

Eligibility Criteria:

  • Education: HSC Pass / Graduate / SSC with minimum 1 year of international BPO experience
  • Experience: US Process experience preferred
  • Gender: Both Male & Female can apply
  • Age: Upto 40 Years

Work Schedule:

  • Shift: US rotational shifts
  • Week Off: 5 days working with 2 rotational offs

Salary:

  • Non-Collections Experienced Candidates: Up to 32k + Travel Allowance + Limited Incentives
  • Collections Experienced Candidates: 32k – 40k + Unlimited Incentives

Transport Facilities:

  • Pick & drop from Mira Road and Thane Station
  • Home Drop available for odd-hour shifts (as per company-defined boundaries & Processes)
  • Additional Transport Reimbursement for those not using company transport

Rounds of Interview:

HR > Operations > Versant
